content: of any stitch markers when online resources my preferred method is to cast on one extra stitch the project is done just pull the rescue row thread out there is and pass it over just make sure your work isn t twisted plenty of great information online hat #43 fish adult size v1 2 abbreviations k knit p purl sw shadow wrap - this is a type of wrap & turn that closes the hole caused by turning the work for short row knit sw - if you are a knit side or if the next stitch is a knit - as it may be in the ribbing for the tail here is how you work a sw on a knit stitch use the tip of your right needle go into the right leg of the stitch under the left needle s first stitch lift that leg up onto the left needle and knit it as a new stitch move this newly created stitch back to the left needle and turn to work the other direction purl sw - if you are a purl side or if the next stitch is a purl - as it may be in the tail ribbing here is how you work a sw on a purl stitch use the tip of your left needle go into the little collar of the stitch under the right needle s first stitch lift that collar up onto the left needle and purl it as a new stitch move this newly created stitch - as well as the stitch you created it from - back onto the left needle and turn to work in the other direction i find it easier to move the purl ones after i ve turned - just don t forget to move it if you do that two important notes 1 when working in rib move the working yarn to whatever side you normally would for working the next stitch even if the next stitch is a sw in other words you just worked x number of stitches and the last stitch you did was a knit now you need to do an sw on a purl stitch move the working yarn to the purl side side before doing the sw 2 anytime you come to a completed sw and are going to work past it work it as one stitch turn just what it says turn the work around and start working back in the other direction k2tog knit 2 together - go through 2 stitches and knit them together kfb knit front and back knit into the front of stitch then without removing the stitch from the left needle knit into the back of the same stitch and slide both off the left needle together this increases your stitch count by one 3 needle bind off 3 needle bind-offs can be done with the right sides together or the wrong sides together depending on what you want to accomplish in this
